'Acrylic acid' (IUPAC: 'prop-2-enoic acid') is an organic compound with the
formula CH 2=CHCO 2H. It is the simplest unsaturated
carboxylic acid, consisting of a vinyl group connected directly to a carboxylic
acid terminus. This colorless liquid has a characteristic acrid or tart smell.
It is miscible with water, alcohols, ethers, and chloroform. More than one
billion kilograms are produced annually. Takashi Ohara,
Takahisa Sato, Noboru Shimizu, GÃ¼nter Prescher Helmut Schwind, Otto Weiberg,
